column5: I was out off of Bluffers the spit...last week... one 16# 2 small shakers out in 250 FOW...down 80  Thinking they must be closer in this week.... How is BLuffers..... lately? staging around credit? oshawa...any reports would be appreciated?  A.
Fished the blue zone other day. On the way in othert boats were in real tight to the Credit. With the pier reports coming in,your best bet for big kings is to be near the rivers. Good luck.
